name: Packages
description:
Game made for ndab jam/quarantine jam.

My friend Dalv (FUTUREvlad2) made most of the game! I just helped him with some stuff.

The ending is very rushed, we didnt have time to finish it. Tutorial is in the game (You can interact with E). 

Sorry for the size of it, my friend didnt have time to delete useless stuff.
